idea-plugin.name: Appium Screen Templates
idea-plugin.description:
Appium Screen Templates helps you quickly generate Appium Page Object screens and matching test classes with a consistent structure.

Key features:
  • Create Appium Screen classes with a single action
  • Optionally generate matching Test classes automatically
  • Auto-create missing folders (src/main, src/test)
  • Smart naming (PascalCase for classes, camelCase for variables)
Designed for teams using Appium + Java who want a clean, repeatable test architecture without boilerplate.

action.description: Create Appium Screen and optional Test class
